  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/4275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/4275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Exercicis i problemes</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises and problems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen und Probleme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices et problèmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios e problemas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni e problemi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις και προβλήματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·leccions d'exercicis i problemes de continguts propis de les àrees de Ciències de la Naturalesa i de Tecnologia. Cada col·lecció consta d'una presentació teòrica, una proposta de deu enunciats de problemes, acompanyats de la corresponent solució numèrica i resolució pas a pas, i exercicis d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Collections of exercises and problems in Natural Sciences and Technology. Each collection consists of a theoretical explanation, ten problems (with the way to solve them and the answers) and self-assessment exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici pràctic</string>
            <string language="en">practical exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">resolució de problemes</string>
            <string language="en">problem solving</string>
            <string language="es">resolución de problemas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia</string>
            <string language="en">technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlungen Übungen und Probleme in den 
natürlichen Wissenschaften und in der Technologie. Jede 
Ansammlung besteht aus einer theoretischen Erklärung, 10 Problemen 
(mit der Methode, sie und die Antworten zu lösen) und Selbstbewertung
Übungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collections d'exercices et problèmes en sciences 
et technologie normales. Chaque collection se compose d'une 
explication théorique, de dix problèmes (avec la voie de résoudre 
eux et les réponses) et d'exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleções dos exercícios e problemas em 
ciências e na tecnologia naturais. Cada coleção consiste em 
uma explanação teórica, em dez problemas (com a maneira resolver os
e as respostas) e em exercícios do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collezioni di esercitazioni e problemi nelle 
scienze e nella tecnologia naturali. Ogni accumulazione consiste
di una spiegazione teorica, di dieci problemi (con il modo risolvere 
loro e le risposte) e delle esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογές των ασκήσεων και των προβλημάτων στις φυσικές
επιστήμες και την τεχνολογία. Κάθε συλλογή αποτελείται από
θεωρητική εξήγηση, δέκα προβλήματα (με τον τρόπο να λυθούν 
αυτοί και οι απαντήσεις) και τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">praktische Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen von Problemen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice pratique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résolution des problèmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício prático</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resolver de problema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione pratica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione dei problemi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρακτική άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίλυση προβλήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
